    BossNotFoundException
    An exception when the API tries to load a boss bar from an ID but it doesn't exist
    BossType
    Available boss bar style enum
    BoundedBufferedReader
    Read big files, with custom max line length and max bytes per line
    Console
    Common console utilities This is very basic and does not support leveled messages for now.
    Console.Colors
    Valid console colors limited by bukkit colors.
    FileCopy
    Copy files from an internal resource into an external file, with this method, when exporting a yaml file, it will check if it already exists, if it does, it will only copy the comments and check values
    FileUtilities
    Utilities for files
    HologramConfiguration
    KarmaHologram configuration
    InventoryDeserializer
    Deserialize a previously serialized inventory
    InventorySerializer
    Serialize an inventory
    ItemStackDeserializer
    Deserialize a previously serialized array of stacks
    ItemStackSerializer
    Serialize an array of stacks
    JarAppender
    KarmaAPI jar appender
    KarmaAPI
    KarmaAPI utilities, such a version, compiler and build date
    KarmaBootstrap
    Minimal bootstrap plugin, called by the loader plugin.
    KarmaFile
    Initialize a karma file, which supports any type of extension and has its own syntax
    KarmaHologram
    Generic karma hologram functions
    KarmaPlugin Deprecated.
    Please use KarmaSource
    KarmaPlugin.getters
    Private GSA code
    KarmaSource  
    KarmaYamlManager
    Karma yaml file manager
    Key
    KarmaFile key object This object contains the value, in case of no value, the key will be used as value

    LogExtension

    Logger
    KarmaSource logger manager, store data in a file
    OffsetConfiguration
    Offset configuration
    PersistentHologram
    Persistent karma hologram, this will store the hologram data into a file to be loaded previously
    PrefixConsoleData
    The prefixes of a karma source when running Console.send(KarmaSource, String, Level) or Console.send(KarmaSource, String, Level, Object...)
    ProgressiveBar
    Available boss bar HP progressive updates
    ReflectionUtil
    KarmaSource reflective utilities
    ResourceDownloader
    KarmaSource resource downloader, to download resources
    RGBTextComponent
    RGB text component, parse a string with #aaaaaa org rgb(0,0,0) to a minecraft rgb formatted text
    SerializableLocation
    Serialize a location or load a serialized location
    ServerVersion
    Initialize the server version utilities
    Sound
    Valid sounds
    SoundPlayer
    Play sounds to a player
    StringUtils
    Utilities for strings
    StringUtils.StringGen
    The random string generation string contents
    StringUtils.StringType
    Random string generation string type
    SubJarAppender
    KarmaAPI external jar appender ( makes uses of JarAppender interface )
    SubJarLoader
    Classloader that can load a jar from within another jar file.
    TempHologram
    Temporal karma hologram, this won't use any file to be stored, once you remove this, you must create it again
    TimeCondition
    Advanced plugin timer timer schedule condition
    TimerNotFoundException
    The exception thrown when the API tries to load an AdvancedSimpleTimer based on a timer id but the timer does not exist

    VersionUtils

    YamlReloader
    Since version 1.2.5 this does not longer save the file, as it should be saved by calling KarmaYamlManager.save(File) or KarmaYamlManager.save(File, KarmaSource, String)
